title: 11 Best Smart Home & Tech Devices During Amazon Prime Day 2020
summary:
If you’ve been thinking about buying one of the best smart home devices for your place, then Amazon Prime Day might be the best time to do so.
For the next two days, the retailer is offering several discounts on those tech items, which will turn just about anything in your house into a digital toy (and make you feel like you’re living in the future).
Items like these are on sale for the next 48 hours—well, that’s if they don’t sell out before the end of Amazon Prime Day.
Over the years, big-ticket items have been known to go quickly, especially the best smart home devices.
So, to help you get a head start, we’ve compiled the best items to upgrade your space, below.
paragraphs: If you’ve been thinking about buying one of the best smart home devices for your place, then Amazon Prime Day might be the best time to do so. For the next two days, the retailer is offering several discounts on those tech items, which will turn just about anything in your house into a digital toy (and make you feel like you’re living in the future).

For a sneak peek of what’s included, consider a camera that has the ability to give treats to your puppy when you’re not at home or a cube that will enable you to completely control your TV by voice. Items like these are on sale for the next 48 hours—well, that’s if they don’t sell out before the end of Amazon Prime Day.
Over the years, big-ticket items have been known to go quickly, especially the best smart home devices. So, to help you get a head start, we’ve compiled the best items to upgrade your space, below.
